lead_paragraph: Several House or Senate members reversed themselves and are again supporting Mr. Trump to try to keep Hillary Clinton out of the White House.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting from Ocala, Fla., and Matt Flegenheimer from Pueblo, Colo.

headline.print_headline: Trump Regains Some Who Left  Over Recording
headline.main: Some in G.O.P. Who Deserted Donald Trump Over Lewd Tape Are Returning

snippet: Several House or Senate members reversed themselves and are again supporting Mr. Trump to try to keep Hillary Clinton out of the White House....
abstract: Republican House and Senate lawmakers who had disavowed Donald Trump are reversing course days later and expressing their support for Republican ticket, if not explicitly presidential nominee, following backlash from Trump supporters; quick reversals illustrate quandary many Republican politicians face as they navigate their own election efforts.
